short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A gateway to manage your real world assets, sponsored gas fee, no seeds phrases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
D/Wallet is a gateway to real-world asset management. D/Wallet is a smart wallet designed for accessibility, compliance, security, and scalability. It efficiently manages your digital assets and personal identity data. It handles self-custodial accounts, KYC credentials, real-world assets, and facilitates fiat and cryptocurrency payments - all without any gas fees with sponsored mechanism.

Integrated with Source.ID, D/Wallet provides easy identification verification and fragmented identity credentials, instilling trust in every transaction. Its delegated transaction technology offers gas-free transactions, prioritizing user convenience and fostering mass adoption of blockchain technology. As the first fully compliant digital wallet, D/Wallet offers built-in KYC verification solutions and scales decentralized finance to a global level.

"In addition, our Self-sovereign identity service endows users with the ability to manage their digital identities and securely share credentials. This makes D/Wallet an integral component of the self-sovereign identity journey. By installing D/Wallet, users embark on a path towards financial empowerment and enhanced security, contributing to our revolution in asset management and identity control." You can connect to D/Bond or any other dApps with D/Wallet and access all Real-World Assets projects with the support of the D/Wallet SDK.

Notice: this extension is currently in beta testing. 

To properly set up the extension, check out our guide on Gitbook: 
https://docs.desmolabs.org/our-solutions/3.-kyc-compliant-wallet

We also have tutorial videos available on our YouTube channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/@desmolabs.
